definition: Funiu mountain range in southwest Henan, an eastern extension of Qinling range 秦嶺山脈|秦岭山脉[Qin2 ling3 shan1 mai4], Shaanxi
surname Fu
to lean over/to fall (go down)/to hide (in ambush)/to conceal oneself/to lie low/hottest days of summer/to submit/to concede defeat/to overcome/to subdue/volt
ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
surname Niu
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan

sentences.english: Winds hundred mile Funiu Mountain, the charm infinite old range.
sentences.chinese: 蜿蜒百里伏牛山，魅力無窮老界嶺。

sentences.english: There are rich plant resources in Funiu Mountain national nature area and 6 national protection plant species are there.
sentences.chinese: 伏牛山國家自然保護區有豐富的植物資源。

sentences.english: Xixia county lies Funiu mountain, there is plenty of resource of graphite.
sentences.chinese: 西峽縣地處伏牛山區，石墨礦藏資源十分豐富。
